attributes.action: A general election to happen now.
attributes.additional_details: Many of us UK citizens disagree with the current party that's in power. Feeling not heard, or controlled too much. We would like a consideration to have a more recent election.
attributes.background: Consider having an election as of now rather than 2029.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
